AboutMe

A few things about me...

BIO

My name is Joe and I am a JavaScript Developer. I am a graduate of the Eleven Fifty Academy in Fishers, Indiana. I fell in love with technology as a kid and never looked back. My free time is usually split between coding, photography, books, and video games.

Job 1

Freelance Web Developer - Present

After graduating from Eleven Fifty in May of 2019 I have been working with a few local businesses on website redesign and updates.

Job 2

Warehouse Manager 2013-2018

I ran the main warehouse for an electrical contractor. I scheduled the days deliveries and took care of all inventory needs. I also took care of all shipping and receiving.

Job 3

Warehouse Manager 2001-2009

My main focus at this job was on shipping/receiving and inventory. I would coordinate with various jobsites and supply houses for the days deliveries. I was in charge of making sure that the warehouse budget was always met.
